entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 28 December 2022
